channel.title: Try out my new Multiplayer (online-based) games
channel.description:
=========RacersOnline========== Hello, I made these games out of game maker :P just a simple game making tool easy to compile things :P
Currently its at V0.5 not many bugs (the only one bug is the bump effect that makes u go out of track some times)
This game currently has 10 cars with some "speed enhancers" cars :P
Any one can play! As long as you don't open the game multiple times you'll have fun!
This game also has in game chatting so you can talk in game :D
hope you like it! http://geocities.com/zirak25/index.html
(Oh yeah don't bother trying the kirby game ... im not really into kirby any more its pretty dead now :P)

item.title: Try out my new Multiplayer (online-based) games
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

Well, considering you know how to make DLLs in pascal, C++, and Delphi, you’re set to look good, and professional.

Read full topic

item.title: Try out my new Multiplayer (online-based) games
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Game maker is fun but i’ve seen so many people think they are some how good at coding and computer languages because they made a game in game maker.

There is this weedy french kid in a year below me at school and I was talking about java to my friend and programming and shit (well i don’t know much about that sort of stuff, just mentioning the usual shit) and then the little french kid comes up “OH YES i know lots of programming languages, i know how to porgram windows and i even make computer games because i can program”. At first i thought “Oh wow wtf is this shit” then he went on to say about game maker and all the projects he has going on for it…
UGHHH

Read full topic
item.source: Try out my new Multiplayer (online-based) games
